metadata.title: CVE-2020-18897 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An use-after-free vulnerability in the libpff_item_tree_create_nodefunction of libyal Libpff before 20180623 allows attackers to cause adenial of service (DOS) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted pff file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-18897` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpff1 - 20180714-2
pff-tools - 20180714-2
python3-pypff - 20180714-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpff package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180714-2').
